name: Diseased Giant Rat
movement: walks at a speed of 30 feet
description: A small, agile rat with a keen sense of smell, often found lurking in sewers and filth.
memorable: Its ability to infect with sewer plague makes it a notable threat despite its low strength.
goals: To survive by lurking in urban filth and attacking unsuspecting adventurers.
relations: Often found in packs, working together to swarm their prey.
environment: Commonly located in urban settings, especially in sewers and filthy areas.
strengths: Keen smell grants advantage on Perception checks, and Pack Tactics gives an edge in combat when allied with other rats.
weaknesses: Fragile with low hit points and limited physical strength.
attacks: Bite attack that deals 4 piercing damage and may infect with disease.
most_powerful_ability: The potential to infect creatures with sewer plague through its bite.
senses: Has advantage on smell-based Perception checks to detect hidden creatures.
additional_information: Relies on numbers to overwhelm targets.
Has low intelligence and can't strategize effectively.
Shows less social ability or insight.
Very agile despite its low strength.
A threat primarily due to its disease-carrying ability.
test_queries: small urban beast that causes disease
rat that infects with sewer plague
agile rat that lives in the sewers
pack tactics rat with keen smell
